<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Dream Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=3876) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 206</row>

**Archetype** [Sleepwalker](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=195)

**Prerequisites**
[Sleepwalker Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3873)

</column>

---

You learn dream-related magic to aid your studies. Choose [_dream message_](/Spells.aspx?ID=90) or [_sleep_](/Spells.aspx?ID=288) upon taking this feat; you learn this spell as a 4th-level innate occult spell. If you choose _sleep_, you can cast the spell only while in a [Daydream Trance](/Feats.aspx?ID=3873). You become trained in occult spell attack rolls and spell DCs, and your spellcasting ability for these spells is Wisdom.

**Special** You can take this feat twice, gaining the spell you didn't select initially the second time.
name: Dream Magic
